entries.abort: Things are too hot. My ship is damaged...pulling out...
entries.arrived_at_loc: The E-62 is jumping into the system now. Stand by.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Enemy fighters detected. Defend the transport.>
entries.attack_warn_1: Rebels! It looks like they were after the E-62 technology after all.
entries.attack_warn_2: A group of Rebels is moving in to attack, be prepared to defend.
entries.complete: The E-62 is away. Return to your superior for further instructions.
entries.failed_destroy: Your orders were to protect that operative and the transport. Report your failure to your superior.
entries.failed_protect: You left the E-62 without an escort! That is unacceptable. Prove yourself worthy! We are sending a new freighter to your location.
entries.found_loc: Location to the E-62 jump point located. Meet the transport there.
entries.goodbye: We have all the information we need. I'm heading back to base. I suggest you do the same.
entries.goodbye_1: We have all the information we need. I'm heading back to base. I suggest you do the same.
entries.goodbye_2: We have all the information we need. I'm heading back to base. I suggest you do the same.
entries.goodbye_3: We have all the information we need. I'm heading back to base. I suggest you do the same.
entries.goodbye_4: We have all the information we need. I'm heading back to base. I suggest you do the same.
entries.goodbye_5: We have all the information we need. I'm heading back to base. I suggest you do the same.
entries.hello: This is Operative 1345-2. I am broadcasting the decoy E-62 information. Keep your eyes peeled.
entries.hull_half: Our hull is at half strength. Get those fighters off of us.
entries.panic_1: Enemy ships incomming. You will have to fend them off.
entries.panic_2: Blast it! We have been spotted.
entries.panic_3: Keep those fighters off of us.
entries.panic_4: Rebel fighters incoming. I hope you know how to fly that thing.
entries.panic_5: Here they come. This isn't good.
entries.quest_escort_d: Once the freighter containing the E-62s has arrived, follow it to it's destination. You will have to protect it from any attempt to attack the vessel. Especially keep a careful eye out for Rebels.
entries.quest_location_d: Remain in the Naboo system. Once you finish the patrol, you will receive a navigation waypoint to the freighter's arrival location. Travel to this location and wait for the arrival of the freighter.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the navigation waypoint supplied to your by Imperial Flight Command. Wait at the arrival waypoint for the freighter to arrive.
entries.reason_1: We are starting our sensor sweep now. Be on the look out for enemy fighters.
entries.reason_2: We are starting our sensor sweep now. Be on the look out for enemy fighters.
entries.reason_3: We are starting our sensor sweep now. Be on the look out for enemy fighters.
entries.reason_4: We are starting our sensor sweep now. Be on the look out for enemy fighters.
entries.reason_5: We are starting our sensor sweep now. Be on the look out for enemy fighters.
entries.shields_depleted: Ok, we just lost our shields. We are not going to last much longer.
entries.split_quest_alert: A new freighter carrying the E-62s is being sent to your system. Meet up with the freighter and make sure it reaches its destination.
entries.taunt_2: I hope you have good insurance.
entries.taunt_3: I have good news and bad news. The good news is that you will die soon. The bad news is that you will die soon.
entries.taunt_4: This will only take a second.
entries.taunt_5: Imperial dog! You will pay for that.
entries.thanks_1: Wow! That was some nice flying.
entries.thanks_2: You really showed those Rebels the might of the Imperial Navy.
entries.title: Naboo System: Escort the Decoy E-62 Transport
entries.title_d: Remain in the Naboo system and escort the freighter through the system. Once you finish the patrol in the Naboo system, you will receive a navigation waypoint to the freighter's arrival location. Travel to this location and wait for the freighter to arrive. Once the freighter arrives, follow it to its destination. You will have to keep it safe from any enemy fighters who attempt to stop it from reaching its destination.
